0.text: Innate: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy  champion hit by his abilities, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion  takedown.
0.html: Innate: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy champion hit by his abilities, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion takedown.
markedPassages: champion
takedown

1.text: Phenomenal Evil: For each stack, Veigar gains  1 ability power.
1.html: Phenomenal Evil: For each stack, Veigar gains  1 ability power.
markedPassages: 1 ability power

0.text: Active: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

1.text: If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of  Phenomenal Evil, tripled against large  minions and  monsters.
1.html: If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of Phenomenal Evil, tripled against large minions and monsters.
markedPassages: Phenomenal Evil
minions
monsters

0.text: Active: Veigar casts down a mass of dark matter that strikes the target location after a 1.221 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Veigar casts down a mass of dark matter that strikes the target location after a 1.221 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Dark Matter's  cooldown is reduced based on stacks of  Phenomenal Evil.
1.html: Dark Matter's  cooldown is reduced based on stacks of Phenomenal Evil.
markedPassages: cooldown
Phenomenal Evil

0.text: Active: Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, remaining there for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are  knocked down and  stunned for a duration.
0.html: Active: Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, remaining there for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are knocked down and stunned for a duration.
markedPassages: knocked down
stunned

1.text: Enemies can be affected by Event Horizon's effects only once per cast.
1.html: Enemies can be affected by Event Horizon's effects only once per cast.

0.text: Active: Veigar sends a primordial burst at the target enemy champion that deals magic damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).
